whatsappButton.message: Hello, I would like to book an appointment at Mandarona Dental Center.

hero.title:
Smile, happiness
is contagious
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Mandarona Dental Center. A team of experts dedicated to your oral health in a modern and warm setting.

intro.title: At Mandarona Dental Center, we combine clinical expertise and cutting-edge technologies to offer you personalized care.
intro.description: Welcome to our office! Our dentists and team look forward to caring for you and your smile. We understand how closely oral health is linked to your overall health, confidence, and appearance. We pride ourselves on cultivating a friendly and positive dental environment where you can always feel at ease.
intro.extendedDescription: Our holistic approach takes into account your overall well-being. We use minimally invasive techniques and biocompatible materials to ensure durable and natural results. Whether for preventive, esthetic, or surgical care, every step is explained in detail to guarantee you a serene and transparent experience.

tech.title: Cutting-edge Technology
tech.desc: We have all the advanced equipment necessary for diagnosis and treatment.

painless.title: Painless Care
painless.desc: The expertise and professionalism of our doctors allow you to benefit from painless care.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: No hidden fees. Prices are clear and correspond to the established estimates.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.desc: Our doctors constantly improve their skills by participating in international conferences.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics
orthodontics.desc: Dental alignment and correction of malpositions for a harmonious smile (Children & Adults).

carePrevention.title: Care & Prevention
carePrevention.desc: Regular checkups, scaling, and preventive treatments for your oral health.

esthetic.title: Dental Esthetics
esthetic.desc: Whitening, veneers, and esthetic restorations to enhance your smile.

surgery.title: Dental Surgery
surgery.desc: Extractions, implants, and surgical interventions performed with expertise.

periodontics.title: Periodontics
periodontics.desc: Treatment of gum diseases to preserve the foundations of your teeth.

prosthesis.title: Dental Prosthesis
prosthesis.desc: Fixed or removable solutions to replace missing teeth and restore function.

quote.text: "I love getting involved in my community. As a dentist, you meet a lot of people and have the opportunity to help many."
quote.author: Dr. Mandarona

checkups.title: The importance of regular checkups
checkups.desc: Discover the latest tips from our dental experts to keep your smile healthy and radiant.

tips.title: Tips for a radiant smile
tips.desc: Discover the latest tips from our dental experts to keep your smile healthy and radiant.

implants.title: Understanding dental implants
implants.desc: Discover the latest tips from our dental experts to keep your smile healthy and radiant.

testimonials.text: "A fantastic experience, which gave me confidence in the quality of care."

hero.subtitle: ABOUT US
hero.title:
Your smile,
our passion
hero.description: For over 17 years, Mandarona Dental Center has been committed to offering excellent care in a warm and modern setting. Our philosophy is based on listening, expertise, and innovation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that every smile tells a unique story. Our mission is to enhance yours through a personalized approach, combining cutting-edge technologies and benevolence.

benevolence.title: Benevolence
benevolence.desc: Attentive listening and optimal comfort for every patient.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: High-quality care performed by passionate experts.

safety.title: Safety
safety.desc: Strict hygiene protocols for your peace of mind.

1.title: Consultation & Diagnosis
1.desc: Complete assessment with 3D imaging for a precise vision.

2.title: Treatment Plan
2.desc: Detailed and transparent proposal adapted to your needs.

3.title: Care & Follow-up
3.desc: Care performed gently and rigorous follow-up.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.description: Discover our complete range of dental care for the whole family.
